Honda Activa 125Great Experience with Activa
by Prashant |22 Jul 2025
My Activa is very good, very nice, and gives good mileage too. The more I use it, the more I realize that you truly understand it only when you ride it yourself.

Review Summary
AI-Generated from user reviews
According to user reviews, the Honda Activa 125 is well-regarded for its reliable performance, comfortable ride, and low maintenance costs, making it a popular choice for daily commuting. Users appreciate its stylish design and satisfactory fuel efficiency. However, some users express concerns about its weight during longer rides and variability in mileage, particularly for long distances.

It delivers a mileage of around 47 km/l, which is quite good. A truly reliable and well-rounded scooter.LikeReplyRead more
